description: This file defines the 'Course' entity class for the learning app, representing a course resource with fields such as title, description, level, duration, and creation timestamp, including JPA annotations for persistence.

classes.name: Course
classes.description: Entity class representing a course resource with fields for id, title, description, level, duration, and creation timestamp, including JPA annotations and lifecycle callback.

methods.name: Course(String, String, String, int)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize a course with specific details.

methods.name: onCreate()
methods.description: Lifecycle callback annotated with @PrePersist to set the creation timestamp if not already set.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the course.

methods.name: getDurationHours()
methods.description: Returns the duration of the course in hours.

methods.name: setDurationHours(int)
methods.description: Sets the duration of the course in hours.

methods.name: getCreatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the course was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt(LocalDateTime)
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the course.
